comment: Snoop Dogg Calls Kanye West an Uncle Tom for Supporting America First Agenda Here is another piece of shit that deserves the noose. This garbage human and "entertainers" like him are responsible for "thug culture" in America which unsurprisingly promotes violence, prostitution, real misogyny, degeneracy, and drug use. Scum like this clown are influences on the youth of today. Music has always played a major role in influencing the minds of our children, no style of music has had as big of a negative effect as "hip-hop". The message in the music is as low and disgusting as it gets, and of course, it is very liberal....
amr:
# ::snt Snoop Dogg Calls Kanye West an Uncle Tom for Supporting America First Agenda Here is another piece of shit that deserves the noose. (m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / call-01
            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Snoop"
                        :op2 "Dogg"))
            :ARG1 (p2 / person
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "Kanye"
                        :op2 "West"))
            :ARG2 " :op3 "))

# ::snt Lmao, nice
(n / nice-01
      :mod (l / laugh-01

            :ARG0 (ii / i)

comment: It doesn't make sense to hate an entire race based on the actions of a few people.
amr:
# ::snt It doesn't make sense to hate an entire race based on the actions of a few people.
(s / sense-02
      :polarity -
      :ARG1 (h / hate-01
            :ARG1 (r / race
                  :mod (e / entire))
            :ARG1-of (b / base-02
                  :ARG2 (a / act-02
                        :ARG0 (p / person
                              :quant (f / few))))))

comment: Stop using hateful racial slurs as a way to get your point across.
amr:
# ::snt Stop using hateful racial slurs as a way to get your point across.
(s / stop-01
      :mode imperative
      :ARG0 (y / you)
      :ARG1 (u / use-01
            :ARG0 y
            :ARG1 (s2 / slur
                  :mod (r / race)
                  :ARG0-of (h / hate-01))
            :ARG2 (g / get-04
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (a / across
                        :domain (p / point-04
                              :ARG0 y)))))
